author.bio: Libertarianish Civic Nationalist that holds free speech and personal accountability as high priorities. I plan to make a Ruqqus fork with political and non-political topics once creation is easier.
author.bio_html: Libertarianish Civic Nationalist that holds free speech and personal accountability as high priorities. I plan to make a Ruqqus fork with political and non-political topics once creation is easier.

body: I've got a suggestion for CaptainMeta4 that may help with more effective moderation, based on my days as a forum moderator years ago (not involving Reddit). I can't seem to figure out how to message someone. Is that locked by rep?
body_html: I've got a suggestion for CaptainMeta4 that may help with more effective moderation, based on my days as a forum moderator years ago (not involving Reddit). I can't seem to figure out how to message someone. Is that locked by rep?

post.title: How do I PM CaptainMeta4? I have a suggestion

body:
Depending on what it is, it may be more appropriate to open an issue on Github: https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/issues/

I have posted bugs and suggestions there because I feel like tagging them or messaging them privately on Discord is just annoying them. Creating a Github issue is also good for collecting discussions, unlike posting in Discord.
body_html:
Depending on what it is, it may be more appropriate to open an issue on Github: https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus/issues/

I have posted bugs and suggestions there because I feel like tagging them or messaging them privately on Discord is just annoying them. Creating a Github issue is also good for collecting discussions, unlike posting in Discord.
